eeks	from	the	first	day	
of your last period. The average 
is 40 weeks. If you are not sure 
about the date of your last 
period, then your early scan will 
give a good indication of when 
your baby will be due.
In the very early weeks, the 
developing baby is called an 
embryo. From about eight 
weeks, it is called a fetus.
Week 3
This is three weeks from the 
first	day	of	your	last	period.	
The fertilised egg moves 
slowly along your fallopian 
tube towards your uterus.
